original_title: Lady Sapiens, à la recherche des femmes de la Préhistoire
overview: Who were the women of prehistoric times? What was their daily life like? For 150 years, researchers have underestimated their role in interpreting discoveries with the a priori of their time. Today, a new generation of researchers is changing this model. As part of the meeting of scientists, a new portrait of these women appears: they discover hunters, artists or clan leaders.
title: Lady Sapiens
